com.codecool.shop.dao.implementation

Class SupplierDaoWithJdbc

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.codecool.shop.dao.implementation.SupplierDaoWithJdbc
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SupplierDao

    public class SupplierDaoWithJdbc
extends java.lang.Object
implements SupplierDao
    Created by kata on 2017.05.09..

    SupplierDaoWithJdbc class!

    The SupplierDaoWithJdbc class implements the SupplierDao interface. Singleton class, can be created only one instance. You can do some database action: - add new supplier to database, - find a supplier by an id - find a supplier by name - remove supplier from the database by id

      • find

        public Supplier find(int id)
        The find method is searching in suppliers table and returns the supplier with the given id. Creates a supplier instance with the acquired data and returns it. Catch SQLException if DB connection or query fails.
        Specified by:
        find in interface SupplierDao
        Parameters:
        id - The id of Supplier to find.
        Returns:
        supplier Supplier object with the provided id.

      • find

        public Supplier find(java.lang.String name)
        The find method is searching in suppliers table and returns the supplier with the given name. Creates a supplier instance with the acquired data and returns it. Catch SQLException if DB connection or query fails.
        Specified by:
        find in interface SupplierDao
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the Supplier to find.
        Returns:
        supplier Supplier object with the provided name.

      • remove

        public void remove(int id)
        The remove method is deleting entry from suppliers table by id. Catch SQLException if DB connection or query fails.
        Specified by:
        remove in interface SupplierDao
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the Supplier to remove.

      • clearAll

        public void clearAll()
        The clearAll method creates a query to delete all entries from suppliers table. We only use it in the tests. Catch SQLException if DB connection or query fails.
        Specified by:
        clearAll in interface SupplierDao

      • getAll

        public java.util.ArrayList<Supplier> getAll()
        The getAll method runs a query to get all entries from suppliers table.
        Specified by:
        getAll in interface SupplierDao
        Returns:
        A list of Supplier objects from the suppliers table.
